chapters.title: Chapter 22: Watchers
chapters.info: Adeleas Namelle, p. 321 (283)—Aes Sedai of the Brown Ajah, one of two Aes Sedai who went into voluntary retreat many years ago to Tifan's Well, a village located in the grassy plains of Arafel. Their goal is some day to write the complete history of the world since the Breaking, and some even before that. See also Namelle, Vandene.
